Spells -- Male Tuomi Human Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Necromantic Weakness: -2 vs. undead effects
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d8
Battle: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4+1 Stealth: (agi) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Research: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6+1 Shooting: (agi) d4
Skill Notes:
Arcane Background (Song Magic): +1 Common Knowledge/+1 Persuasion/+1 Knowledge (folklore)
Attractive: +1 Performance (attracted target)/+1 Persuasion (attracted target)
Bad Eyes+: -2 on visual trait rolls
Streetwise: +2 Intimidation (criminal network)/+2 Persuasion (criminal network)/+2 Common Knowledge (criminals)
Size: 0 Deity: Hoenir
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 30 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 4
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (7 points): Arcane Background (Rune Magic); Arcane Background (Song Magic); Attractive; Beast Bond; Quick; Streetwise; Two-Fisted Hindrances: Bad Eyes+; Necromantic Weakness; Obligation; Ruthless Tuomi Human Features: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Beast Bond: Spend Bennies on companion animals
Obligation: Has regular responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Toughness: 7 (0) Cover: 0 Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Unarmed: 1 (d8+0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Quick: Discard and redraw Action Cards lower than 6
Ruthless: Attacks those opposing personal goal
Two-Fisted: No multi-action penalty for melee attack with each hand
Arcana
Power Count: 4 Power Points: 20
Powers:
Aim: (1 PP) Touched +2 attack (Raise +4) w/thrown or missile weapon for 5 rd
Altered Senses: (1 PP) Touched gains Infravision or Low Light Vision (Raise both) for 10 min
Analyze Foe: (1 PP) Self knows number of edges and highest attack skill of target (Raise names of edges and attack skill dice)
Animate War Tree: (8 PP) Touched 30' tree animates (Raise as wild card) for 5 rd
Battle Song: (2 PP) Creatures in 2" gain Berserk features for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Becalm: (2 PP) Target ship suffers half speed for 1 dy
Bladebreaker: (2 PP) R8" Target weapon destroyed (Weapon die type neg)
Bless/Panic: (2 PP) Allies in 6" gain +2 Spirit (or foes suffer -2) vs. fear (Raise +4/-4) for 10 min
Bridge: (1 PP) Creates horizontal surface 0.5" wide by 2" long for 5 rd
Champion Of The Faith: (1 PP) Self gains Champion or Holy Warrior features for 5 rd
Charismatic Aura: (2 PP) Self gains +1 Persuasion (Raise +2) for 10 min
Disease: (2 PP) R6" Target suffers disease and fatigue (Vigor neg)
Elemental Form: (3 PP) Self gains elemental form special abilities for 5 rd
Energy Immunity: (2 PP) Touched takes half damage (Raise no damage) from chosen energy attack for 5 rd
Enhance Undead: (3 PP) R8" Undead targets gain advance benefit for 1 hr (Raise 6 hr; 2 Raises 1 dy)
Fatigue: (3 PP) R12 2" radius (Raise 3") inflicts fatigue (Vigor neg)
Feast: (5 PP) R8" Creates 20 lb of basic food
Fog Cloud: (3 PP) 4 mile fog reduces lighting 1 step (Raise 2 steps) for 1 hr
Fortune's Favored: (3 PP) Target can reroll failed benny-purchased reroll for 5 rd
Gift Of Battle: (4 PP) Touched gains leadership edge features (Raise 2 edges) for 1 hr
Glyph: (4 PP) Glyph stores spell effects until triggered
Gravespeak: (1 PP) Self can ask spirit 6 questions
Greater Zombie: (4 PP) R12" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr
Heat Mask: (1 PP) Touched invisible to infravision for 1 hr
Leaping: (1 PP) Touched gains dbl jumping distance (Raise x4) for 5 rd
Lock/Unlock: (1 PP) Locks touched w/-2 pick penalty and +2 Toughness (Raise -4 and +4) or unlocks touched normal lock
Luck/Jinx: (3 PP) Touched takes the best/worst of two trait rolls for 5 rd
Mend: (3 PP) Repairs damage done to touched wooden vehicle w/in past hr
Mimic: (2 PP) R6" Self can cast spell used by another w/in 1 hr
Mind Rider: (3 PP) Self can use target's senses for 1 hr (Spirit neg)
Negate Arcana: (5 PP) R8" 2" radius suppresses magic for 1 hr
Nightmare: (2 PP) R8 miles Target loses benefit of sleep, becomes frightened (Spirit neg)
Precognition: (2 PP) Self can rearrange 2 Action Cards (Raise 4) next rd
Prolonged Blast: (6 PP) R24" Choice of 1" or 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) for 5 rd
Quake: (6 PP) R24" 3" radius inflicts 2d10 damage (Agility neg)
Refuge: (4 PP) R8" 10'x6' shelter gives +2 Vigor vs. cold (Raise +4) for 12 hr
Regenerate: (3 PP) Touched gains free -2 Soak roll (Raise -0) for 5 rd
Sacrifice: (1 PP) Self gains +1 arcane skill per victim Spirit die step for 5 rd
Sanctuary: (4 PP) Self returns to safe location
Sentry: (3 PP) R16" Creates overnight ghostly sentry or object alarm
Sluggish Reflexes: (2 PP) R16" Target draws 1 fewer Action Card or takes the worst of 2 cards (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Sphere Of Might: (4 PP) R8" 1" sphere around target inflicts -1 attacks (Raise -2), attacks as d8 Fighting doing d8+d4 damge (Raise d8+d8)
Storm: (5 PP) Creates or dissipates 10 mile lightning storm or blizzard for 1 hr
Strength Of The Undead: (2 PP) Self mimics touched undead's trait or special ability (Raise 2) for 5 rd
Summon Beast: (Special PP) R40" Self controls summoned beast's actions for 10 min
Summon Demon: (Special PP) R16" Brings demon from the Abyss for 1 hr
Summon Elemental: (4 PP) R16" Self controls summoned elemental's actions for 5 rd
Summon Herald: (8 PP) R16 Brings herald of deity for support
Viper Weapon: (2 PP) R16" Transforms target weapon into viper for 5 rd
Voice On The Wind: (3 PP) R400 miles Transmits 30-word message to known target
Wandering Senses: (2 PP) R80" Self senses remotely for 10 min
Warding: (5 PP) Bars specified creature type from 2" radius (Raise 3" radius) for 1 hr
Water Walk: (2 PP) Touched can traverse calm water for 10 min
Weaken Undead: (2 PP) R6" Target undead loses undead ability (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Weapon Immunity: (3 PP) Touched takes half damage (Raise no damage) from specified weapon type for 5 rd
Wilderness Step: (1 PP) Touched treats all terrain as normal for 1 hr
Zephyr: (2 PP) Creates moderate wind for 1 dy
